director.name: 列夫·阿塔马诺夫 Lev Atamanov

introduction: Two short stories: A story about a chicken who made friends with a duckling and tried to imitate him in everything, even wanted to learn how to swim. The story of the three kittens - white, gray and black. They changed color all the time, because they always got somewhere: then they became white in flour and then became black in mud and then swam in pure water and became wet, and only once they dried up: one - white, the second - gray and the third one - black. Written by Peter-Patrick76 (peter-patrick@mail.com)
